text:
Grand Rounds | Staff Java/Spark Engineer | San Francisco | Onsite | Fulltime

Building our next gen data platform to enable real time healthcare delivery. Looking for very senior distributed computing expert to join the team. Strong experience with likes of Kafka, Spark, Cassandra a requirements. Experience with healthcare a plus. We have a fun, fast paste, super collaborative team and are looking for a very senior team member to join and help us build this next generation platform to enable services and processes in healthcare never done before.Send resumes to bashir@grandrounds.com opportunity link: https://jobs.lever.co/grandrounds/2b58459d-a009-4d79-8eb7-4b...
